:::{.monospace}
Three paragraphs formated in monospace (aka teletext) font.

Unlike verbatim, you can use **bold text**, *italic text* and ***bold italic
text*** in the monospace divs or spans just like in any other place.

You can split a very log string so that it fits in the page via hyphenation by
inserting a `\-` where you want the string to be cut and wrapped. Here is an
example:

1111111111222222222233333333334444444444555555555566666\-6666677777777778888888888

{{< lipsum 1 >}}

{{< lipsum 1 >}}
:::

{{< lipsum 1 >}}
:::

:::{.noparindent}
Three paragraphs no paragraph indentation.

{{< lipsum 1 >}}

{{< lipsum 1 >}}
:::

:::{parskip=1ex}
Four paragraphs space between them.

{{< lipsum 1 >}}

{{< lipsum 1 >}}

{{< lipsum 1 >}}
:::

And the same thing with spans [this is bold]{.bold}, [this is italic]{.italic},
[this is strikethrough]{.strikethrough}, [this is in small caps]{.smallcaps},
[this is monospace]{.monospace} and
[this is all together]{.bold .italic .strikethrough .smallcaps}, that's it.
